long_description: With a hybrid design, the Scott Metrix 30 bike offers speedy performance on roads and paths along with a comfortable upright riding position, making it great for everyday riding, commuting and more. 6061 aluminum frame offers sturdy performance to tackle rough urban roads and paths as well as go the distance on scenic country roads. Flat handlebar creates a comfortable, upright riding position that also allows better heads-up visiblity than traditional drop road bike handlebars. Drivetrain features Shimano components for dependable, lasting performance and easy shifting through the 27 gear combinations. Tektro RX1 linear-pull brakes make it easy to manage your speed. Fast-rolling and agile 700c wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Schwalbe Road Cruiser tires. Frame eyelets accept fenders or a rear rack (sold separately). Specs on the Scott Metrix 30 bike are subject to change.
